Spells:
Dark Star (W8 Evoc): R150' 40' radius sphere inflicts 8d10 HP force (Con half), disintegrates dead, negates sight and sound for conc or 1 min
Fortune's Favor (W2 Divi): R60' Target gains Adv on 1 attack, ability, or save, or foe Disadv on 1 attack, within 1 hr
Gift Of Alacrity (W1 Divi): Willing touched gains +1d8 initiative for 8 hr
Gravity Fissure (W6 Evoc): 5'x100' line inflicts 8d8 HP force (Con half), pulls and inflicts 8d8 HP force on creatures w/in 10' (Con neg)
Gravity Sinkhole (W4 Evoc): R120' 20' radius inflicts 5d10 HP force and pulls to center (Con half HP only)
Immovable Object (W2 Tran): Touched 10 lb object movable only by specified creatures (Str move 10') for 1 hr
Magnify Gravity (W1 Tran): R60' 10' radius inflicts 2d8 HP force and half speed (Con half HP only) for 1 rd
Pulse Wave (W3 Evoc): 30' cone inflicts 6d6 HP force and pulls or pushes 15' (Con half HP only)
Ravenous Void (W9 Evoc): R1000' 20' radius inflicts 5d10 HP force and restrains, destroys dead and nonmagical objects, and creates 120' radius difficult terrain that pulls to center for conc or 1 min
Reality Break (W8 Conj): R60' Target loses reactions and suffers random effects (Wis neg) for conc or 1 min
Sapping Sting (W0 Necr): R30' Target suffers 4d4 HP and knocked prone (Con neg)
Temporal Shunt (W5 Tran): R120' Target disappears for 1 rd, losing action (Wis neg)
Tether Essence (W7 Necr): R60' Two targets lose/gain HP identically for conc or 1 hr or until 0 HP (Con neg, Disadv if w/in 30')
Time Ravage (W9 Necr): R90' Target aged to near-death, suffers 10d12 HP necrotic (Con half HP only)
Wristpocket (W2 Conj): Touched 5 lb object moves to/from extradimensional space for conc or 1 hr
Magic Notes:
Greater Portent: Replace roll 3/long rest
Arcane Recovery: Short rest recovers 10 spell slot levels 1/dy
Divination Savant: Copy divination spells into spellbook for half cost
Elemental Adept (Thunder): Thunder spells ignore resistance; treat 1s as 2s on damage die
Expert Divination: Casting divination spell restores lower spell slot
Portent: Replace visible creature's attack, ability, or saving throw 3/long rest
Ritual Casting: Cast known spell as ritual
Signature Spells: Cast 2 chosen W3 spells 1/short rest
Spell Mastery: Cast chosen W1 spell and W2 spell at will
The Third Eye: Use action to gain 60' darkvision, 60' ethereal sight, universal language comprehension, or 10' invisibility sight
